author: costin
msg: Moved "hasHook" to an interceptor, it's used by Container when it adds
Added more comments, moved auxiliary code at end of the file.
Removed unused code ( the old methods[], etc).

author: costin
msg: The method doesn't work with virtual hosts, and it wasn't used in any
Any Context that needs the "/" webapps of the "default" host can
get it in the addContext() hook, no need to keep it explicitely in core.

author: costin
msg: Moved "DEFAULT_WORK_DIR" from ContextManager to an interceptor.
The setting can be changed ( if tomcat is integrated in other products
for example ), and "core" shouldn't depend on what happens to be used

author: costin
msg: Various utilities using introspection to do tricks.
hasHook is used to determine if a class "overrides" a method in a parent
Other common ( high level ) introspection helpers can be added.
